title: Tender for the Supply of 27,000 Vials of Concentrated Monoclonal Purified and Detergent Treated Dried Factor VIII Fraction 200 IU - 350 IU
decision_details: - The proposal made by Hon.(Dr) Rajitha Seneratne, the Minister of Health, Nutrition and Indigenous Medicine, to award the tender for the purchase of the above drug used for the treatment of haemophilia patients, as recommended by the Standing Cabinet Appointed Procurement Committee, was approved by the Cabinet.
